Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Bawukanga mbu Omwikanyilisi yabeetsela okhurula mubo! Abakhayi nibaboola mbu: “ po kano nikokhuchenjia.”
Mbu nikhulifwa mana khube liloba, okhukalukha okho khuli ehale (shikhunyalikhana tawe)
Toto khwamanya shosi shiosi shilemukha khusialo mubio, ne khuli nende eshitabo eshibikhanga koosi
Halali bakhaya obwatoto olwabwabeetsela, mana abo bali mubukoyanu
Shibalolangakhwo likulu hekulu wabu, shingala khwaliumbakha mana nikhulirona, shililikhwo nolwafwa tawe
Ne liloba khwalikwaalasia mana nikhuliramwo	tsingulu,	mana nikhumesiakhwo buli imbia yemimela
Kho shibe eshilolelo nende eshitsulisio khu buli omusumba ulunjikha khuNyasaye
Ne khweshia amaatsi ketsimbabaasi okhurula mwikulu nikhumesilia emikunda nende imele ichesungwa
Nende emitende emirambi chilikhwo ebibuli (chiebulana mubunji)
Omukabo khubandu banje, mana nikhulamusia eshialo shiali nishifwile, ne ni endio nilwa Abandu balilamusibwa
Bakhaya imbeli wabu Abandu ba Nuh nende Abandu ba Rasi nende ba Thamud
Nende ba Aa’d nende ba Firaun nende Abana babu Lut
Nende abamenyi ba Aikat (bomumasokholio) , nende Abandu ba Tubaa, boosi bakhaya Abarumwa mana kabekanyilisibwa nikabanyoola
Ne muparanga	khwachong’a olwakhwabaloonga olwokhuranjilila ? halali bo bali nobukanakani khukhuloongwa okhuyiakha
